title: Start or Sit (AFC): Ravens/Colts/Chiefs RBs and Much More! (11/05 Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Let's check in on the Packers-49ers game and talk about the worthwhile Fantasy options. Are we upgrading the 49ers TEs given the lack of WRs available? And we've got more big news (3:45) including Matthew Stafford, Michael Thomas, Christian McCaffrey and the Bucs WRs. And find out who we love this week (7:15) and who to avoid (10:10). It's Chase Edmonds time! ... More news and notes (14:45), "Sixty Second Rankings Disputes" (19:05) on David Montgomery, the Ravens RBs and D.J. Chark plus the Startometer (28:40) for HOU-JAC, SEA-BUF, NE-NYJ ... Start or Sit for Ravens -Colts (34:01), Bears-Titans (41:55), Panthers-Chiefs (53:00), Raiders-Chargers (57:30), Texans-Jaguars (1:04:30), Seahawks-Bills (1:06:18), Patriots-Jets (11:42) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
You can also download and subscribe to the full-length Fantasy Football Today podcast here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/fantasy-football-today-podcast/id261735167
Follow the new FFT Twitch channel: https://www.twitch.tv/FFToday
Follow our FFT team on Twitter: @FFToday, @AdamAizer, @JameyEisenberg, @daverichard, @heathcummingssr, @BenSchragg
Watch FFT on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCviK78rIWXhZdFzJ1Woi7Fg/videos
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/FantasyFootballToday/
Sign up for the FFT newsletter https://www.cbssports.com/newsletter
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

itunes:title: Start or Sit (AFC): Ravens/Colts/Chiefs RBs and Much More! (11/05 Fantasy Football Podcast)
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Are we confident in Jonathan Taylor? Lamar Jackson? BAL RBs? Cam Newton? Corey Davis? And we'll update you on who to start in the GB-SF game
